section.title: Demonstration 10 Main Page

content.text: This demonstration covers a simple credit card reconciliation to a credit card log (CL) and linking to the asset record. It provides a step-by-step guide of linking the asset record and changing the amount reconciled to the transaction line. It demonstrates the following key concepts: Referencing an asset on a transaction line Choosing a reconciliation amount to allocate to the transaction line.
